entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 7:10 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
